ModMetaData.name: Project Armory 1.2
ModMetaData.author: Plymouth
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.2.0.8 Hey there!
Project Armoury 20th century pack adds 203 weapon designs from the later half of 20th century to rimworld(1945-2000), which are extensively balanced using linear mathematical conversion and approximation formulas,this mod aims to add a lot of variety while remaining vanilla balance-friendly, as well as lore-friendly. Each weapon design has a short description of it's origins. This mod has been a long time in the making, and if you see any bugs be it duplicated descriptions or weapon being utterly unbalanced please do report!
Have fun!
:)
Changelog: 1.2.0.8 Added single-use rocket launchers with custom projectile graphics, added crafting workbenches to build them. Murderbone galore!
1.1.0.8 Fixed some values for revolvers while creating stat lists.
1.1.0.7 Added a tag to submachine guns. Now they will actually appear in-game.
1.1.0.6 Added smeltability.
1.1.0.5 Fixed some shotguns not firing many pellets but just 1.
1.1.0.4 Added WorkGiver.xml so that the colonists will actually work.
Reduced the placement size of smoothbore workbench to 1x1.
1.1.0.3 Added Rifling and Smoothbore workbenches in order to reduce clutter, they are unlocked when you reach a certain tech level(Gunsmithing for Smoothbore, Precision Rifling for Rifle).
Added revolvers and shotguns.
Added weapon size scaling and dependency on Proper Shotguns mod.
To run this mod properly you'll be required to install JecsTools libraries and XeoNovaDan's ProperShotguns.
1.0.0.3 Fixed values for G11 thanks to the new info.
